name: Yinkan-MusicBot
description: A feature-rich Discord music bot using discord.js v14 and discord-player v6, with dynamic voice channels and more.

TOKEN.description: Your Discord Bot Token from the Discord Developer Portal.

CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID of your Discord Bot Application.

ADMIN_ID.description: The Discord User ID of the bot administrator for admin commands.

YT_COOKIE.description: (Optional) Your YouTube cookie to bypass certain playback restrictions.
